dct_title_s: Nova Anglia, Novum Belgium et Virginia
dct_description_sm: Relief shown pictorially. Includes inset: Bermuda majori mole expressa. "Copied from the map in De Laet's "Novus Orbis" (ed. 1633) by J.F.T. (?), 1860."--note in lower right-hand corner. Facsimile of map originally published: Lugd. Batav. [Leiden] : Apud Elzevirios, 1633.
